name: Vincent van Gogh
what_did:
Van Gogh painted bright, emotional pictures like 'Starry Night' and 'Sunflowers'.
He used thick paint and swirling colors to show how he felt.
Even though he sold few paintings in his life, he became one of the most famous artists in the world.
why_matters:
Van Gogh changed how people think about art and emotions.
His bold style inspired many artists after him.
His life also shows how hard it can be to follow your passion.

fun_fact: Van Gogh painted over 2,000 artworks but only sold a few while he was alive!
